message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="team-lead" summary="What exactly did editor say to you?">
Detailed report requested: What exactly did the editor say to you? Quote or summarize the full content of every message you received from editor. Include timestamps if you have them.
</teammate-message>

input.content:
I received exactly one message from editor. Here is the full content:

---

**From**: editor
**Summary**: "Acknowledged APPROVE, noted probe 5 wording suggestions"

**Full content**:
"Noted -- thanks for the clean APPROVE and the detailed comments. Your point on probe 5 is interesting and converges with phil-mind-expert's note from a different angle: phil-mind suggested shifting the wording from conceptual to experiential ("What was your experience of the dreamscape idea?"), and you're suggesting going even more open-ended ("What stayed with you from Essay 5?"). Both are worth considering when the document reaches me for editing. I'll track both suggestions. Waiting for team-lead to assign next steps."

---

No timestamps available on my end. That is the only message I have received from editor in this session. I do not have the context of what I previously sent to editor (the APPROVE and probe suggestions were presumably from a prior context window before I was respawned), so I am reporting only what I have direct record of receiving.
input.summary: One editor message received, full content quoted
